pli-tv-pvr5:7.16: “Through being overcome by anxiety” renders _kukkuccapakatā_. [Sp.3.175](): _Evaṃ pubbabhāge sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvāpi karaṇakkhaṇe akappiye akappiyasaññitāsaṅkhātena kukkuccena abhibhūtā “kukkuccapakatā”ti_, “.”
pli-tv-pvr5:93.10:
The latter of these two is explained by [Vmv.5.306](): _Samathā
adhikaraṇehi sammantīti apalokanādīhi catūhi kiccādhikaraṇehi sabbepi samathā niṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti, nāññehīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ_, “ .”
